panels.visual: Lunara casting firebolt Mephit blinking to avoid Fire tracking it through teleports **Sound EFFECTS:** "FWOOSH!"
Firebolt connecting Mephit shrieking, partially dispersed **Sound EFFECTS:** "SKREEEEE!"
Prismor channeling poison spray Toxic mist coating mephit
Mephit dissolving into light Energy flowing back to damaged rune Rune fading **Sound EFFECTS:** "WHOOOOSH"
panels.dialogue: Pocky: "It was bound to the tampered rune! Destroying it freed the passage!"
